desc.zh: 宁波轨道交通（Ningbo Rail Transit），是服务于中国浙江省宁波市的城市轨道交通，其第一条地铁线路于2014年5月30日开通试运营，使宁波成为中国内地第二十一座开通轨道交通的城市。截至2023年1月，宁波轨道交通运营线路共有5条，分别为1号线、2号线、3号线、4号线、5号线，总运营里程约185公里，共设车站127（含重复）座。宁波轨道交通在建线路共有8段，包括3号线二期、4号线东延段、4号线西延段、6号线一期、7号线、8号线一期、市域铁路象山线和市域铁路慈溪线。
desc.en: Ningbo Rail Transit is an urban rail transit serving Ningbo, Zhejiang Province, China. Its first subway line was put into trial operation on May 30, 2014, making Ningbo the 21st city in mainland China to open rail transit. As of January 2023, Ningbo Rail Transit has 5 lines in operation, including Line 1, Line 2, Line 3, Line 4 and Line 5, with a total operating mileage of about 185 km and 127 stations (including duplication). There are 8 lines under construction in Ningbo Rail Transit, including Line 3 Phase II, Line 4 East Extension, Line 4 West Extension, Line 6 Phase I, Line 7, Line 8 Phase I, Xiangshan City Railway and Cixi City Railway.
